snippet.title: Super Bafo Championship Trailer
snippet.description:
On the street in your neighborhood, the biggest Bafo competition in history is taking place. Face powerful opponents in a turn based combat and collect all the cards to be known as the Grand Champion of Bafo.

Bafo is traditional brazilian game that you must swap/turn up stickers or cards with your bare hands to win - you hit your hand (like a shell) on the stickers upside down, and if a sticker turns around, you win it.

In this game we pay homage to the fighting games classics aesthetics and themes from the 90's and all the stickers/cards were made representing the culture of our land: Maranhão (Brazil).
